<script>
!function(f,b,e,v,n,t,s){if(f.fbq)return;n=f.fbq=function(){n.callMethod?
n.callMethod.apply(n,arguments):n.queue.push(arguments)};if(!f._fbq)f._fbq=n;
n.push=n;n.loaded=!0;n.version='2.0';n.queue=[];t=b.createElement(e);t.async=!0;
t.src=v;s=b.getElementsByTagName(e)[0];s.parentNode.insertBefore(t,s)}(window,
document,'script','https://connect.facebook.net/en_US/fbevents.js');

var facebookCustomerData = {}
var em = {{Customer Email}};
if (typeof em !== 'undefined') {
  facebookCustomerData.em = em;
}
  
fbq('init', '{{Facebook Pixel ID}}', facebookCustomerData);
fbq('track', 'PageView');
</script>

<script>
  
fbq('track', 'AddToCart', {
  content_ids: [{{Product ID}}],
  content_type: 'product',
  value: {{Product Price}},
  currency: '{{Currency Code}}'
});
  
</script>

<script>
fbq('track', 'ViewContent', {
content_ids: ["{{Product ID}}"],
content_type: 'product',
value: {{Product Price}},
currency: '{{Currency Code}}'
});
</script>

<script> 
  fbq('track', 'Purchase', {
    content_ids: {{Purchase Product IDs}},
    content_type: 'product',
    value: {{Purchase Revenue}},
    currency: '{{Currency Code}}'
   });
</script>

<script>
  (function() {
    var dataset = {{Element Dataset}};
    var eventParams = {
      content_type: 'product',
      currency: '{{Currency Code}}'
    };

    if (dataset && dataset.hasOwnProperty('productSku') && dataset.productSku) {
      eventParams.content_ids = [dataset.productSku];
    } else if ({{Product ID}}) {
      eventParams.content_ids = [{{Product ID}}];
    }

    if (dataset && dataset.hasOwnProperty('productPrice') && dataset.productPrice) {
      eventParams.value = dataset.productPrice;
    } else if ({{Product Price}}) {
      eventParams.value = {{Product Price}};
    }

    fbq('track', 'AddToWishlist', eventParams);
  })();
</script>

<script>
  (function() {
    var dataset = {{Element Dataset}};
    var eventParams = {
      content_type: 'product',
      currency: '{{Currency Code}}'
    };

    if (dataset && dataset.hasOwnProperty('productSku') && dataset.productSku) {
      eventParams.content_ids = [dataset.productSku];
    } else if ({{Product ID}}) {
      eventParams.content_ids = [{{Product ID}}];
    }

    if (dataset && dataset.hasOwnProperty('productPrice') && dataset.productPrice) {
      eventParams.value = dataset.productPrice;
    } else if ({{Product Price}}) {
      eventParams.value = {{Product Price}};
    }

    fbq('track', 'AddToCompare', eventParams);
  })();
</script>
